briefdescription.para: Raise base to the power of exp.

simplesect.para: This function is not recursive, but will take O(n) time to calculate based on the integer value of n.

briefdescription.para: Calculate sine of rads, using a lookup table.
Calculate cosine of rads, using a lookup table.
Calculate tangent of rads, using sin x / cos x.

parameterdescription.para: the number whose square root is to be calculated

simplesect.para: double calculated square root of x

briefdescription.para: Returns the absolute value of a floating point number.
Rounds a floating point number down to the nearest integer value.

simplesect.para: The largest integer value less than or equal to x, as a double.

briefdescription.para: Computes the floating-point remainder of x / y.

detaileddescription.para: The result is x - n * y, where n is the integer quotient of x / y, truncated toward zero.

simplesect.para: The remainder of x divided by y.

briefdescription.para: Rounds a floating-point value up to the nearest integer.

simplesect.para: The smallest integer value not less than x.

briefdescription.para: Rounds a floating-point value to the nearest integer.

detaileddescription.para: Values halfway between two integers are rounded away from zero.

simplesect.para: The nearest integer as a double.

briefdescription.para: Computes the arc tangent of y/x using the signs of both arguments to determine the correct quadrant of the result.

simplesect.para: The angle in radians between -PI and PI.

briefdescription.para: Computes the arc tangent of x (inverse tangent).

detaileddescription.para: The result is in radians, between -PI/2 and PI/2.

briefdescription.para: Returns the arc sine (inverse sine) of x.

simplesect.para: The arcsin of x in radians.

briefdescription.para: Returns the arc cosine (inverse cosine) of x.

simplesect.para: The arccos of x in radians.

briefdescription.para: Calculates e raised to the power of x.
Computes the natural logarithm (ln) of x.
